verses.content: Chun, Juda mihai po po chun Uzzia chu an ṭhuoi a, ama chu kum sâwm paruka upa a na, a pa Amazia hmuna chun lalah an siem tah a.
Eloth chu a bâwl a, Juda rama chun a pêk nâwk a; chu hnunga chun lal chu a thlatuhai lai chun a in ve tah a.
Uzzia chun ro a rêl ṭan chun kum sâwmparuka upa a na; Jerusalema chun kum sâwmnga pahni sûng ro a rêl a, a nu hming khawm Jerusalema mi Jekolia a nih.
Ama khawm chun a pa Amazia lo thaw ta ang tak khan LALPA mithmuah thil indik chu a thawh a.
Pathiena thil hmulâwk hriet- thiemna nei Zekaria dam sûng po chun Pathien chu zawng dingin ân siem a; LALPA chu a zawng sûng po chu, Pathien chun ân hlawtlingtir bawk a.
Chun, a fe suok a, Philistin mihai ân dopui a; Gath kul le, Jabne kul le Asdod kul chu a suk- siet a; chun, Philistin mihai laia le Asdod biela chun khuohai a siem bawk a.
Chun, Philistin mihai le Arabia mihai Gur-baal le Meunima umhai laia chun Pathien chun a ṭhangpui a.
Chuongchun, Ammon mihai chun Uzzia kuomah sie an hung chawi a, a hming chu Aigupta ram lûtna chen rauin a hung inthang tah a; a hung hrât êm êm el ta sih a.
Chunawa khawm, Uzzia chun a Kil dâi Kawtkhâr bula dâm, Ruom dâi Kawtkhâra dâm, chun, kul hung kâwina hmuna dâm khan vêngna in insânghai a bâwl a, sipaihai a sie sip a.

Thlalêra dâm khawm vêngna in insânghai a bâwl a, tuisunsuohai tamtak a cho bawk a, ran ruol tamtak a nei sih a, tlângṭhuta le phaizâwla dâm khawm chun; lo hmun ṭhahai le tlâng rama dâm chun huon puhai le grêp hrui enkawltuhai a nei a, huon siem vêl hi a châk zâwngtak a ni sih a.
Chunawa khawm Uzzia chun indo mi, sipai pâwl, Hanania kut hnuoi, hotu Maaseia le lekhaziektu Jeielin anni tiema an nizât ang peia, a pâwl peia indoa fe suok hlakhai chu a nei bawk a.
Pahnamhai laia ṭhuoituhai, mi hrât khawkhênghai an rênga an nizât chu sâng hni le za ruk an nih.
Anni kut hnuoi a chun sipai inchûkthiem sa, hmêlma chunga lal chu ṭhangpui dinga, thilthawtheina nasatak le va do thei mihai chu nuoi thum, sâng sari le za nga an nih.
Chun, Uzzia chun an ta dingin, sipai po pohai ta ding chun, phâwhai, feihai, thîr lukhumhai, indona zakuo- hai, thalngulhai, dêngvira dinga lunghai leh a siemrêl vawng a.

Jerusalema chun mi them- thiemhai hmusuokin, khâwl lihai, vêngna in insânghaia um ding le, a kia vêngna in insânga ding chun, lunghai le thalhai chu kâp thei dingin, a siem bawk a. Chuongchun, a hming chu nasatakin ân dar a, a suksuol hma po khan chu maktaka ṭhangpuiin a um sih a.

Nisienlakhawm, a hung hrât chun, a lungril a hung uong a, khawhlotakin a thaw tah a, a Pathien LALPA chunga chun a bawsiet tah a; riminhnik rawna mâichâm chunga riminhnik raw dingin LALPA biek ina chun a fe ve ta a.
Ama hnunga chun thiempu Azaria chu, LALPA thiempu sâwm- riet, mi thil thawtheitak takhai le chun a va lût veh a;

lal Uzzia chu an sawisêl a, a kuoma chun, “Uzzia, LALPA kuoma riminhnik raw hi nanga chan a ni nawh a, Aron naupasalhai thiem- puhai, riminhnik raw dinga suk- thienga umhai chan a ni lem; hmun inthienga inthawk hin fe suok rawh; i bawsiet a ni ta sih a; LALPA Pathiena inthawka inza i kaina khawm ni chuong bawk naw nih,” an ta.

Uzzia chu a lunginsen a; rimin- hnik chu raw dingin riminhnik râwna mei lâkna chu a kuta chun a um zing a; chun, thiempuhai chunga a lungin- sen lai chun, riminhnik râwna mâichâm sîra, LALPA ina thiempu- hai hmaa chun a bâwka hin inphârna hri a hung suok tah a.

Chun, thiempu laltak Azaria le thiempu danghai po po chun ama chu an en zing a, chun, ngai ta, a bâwka chun a hung inphâr tah a, chutaka inthawk chun inrangtakin an hnawt- suok tah a; anih, LALPA chun ama chu a hrem tâk lei chun ama ngei khawm chun fe suok chu ân hmaw tah a.

Chuongchun, lal Uzzia chu a thi ni chen chun inphâr a ni tah a; in hranah a um a, inphâr a na; LALPA ina inthawk chun sât thlâk a ni ta sih a; a naupa Jotham chu lal in enkawl- tu, ram sûnga mipuihai rorêltu a hung ni tah a.
Chun, Uzzia thilthaw, a hmasa le a nuhnunghai khawm Amoz naupa Zâwlnei Isai chun a ziek a.

Chuongchun, Uzzia chu a thla- tuhai laia chun a in tah a; inphûmna thlân muol lalhai taa chun a thla- tuhai lai chun an phûm tah a, “Inphâr a ni annâwm,” an ti sih a; chun, a naupa Jotham chun ama aia chun ro a rêl tah a.
